description:
Cadillac attacks Earth with his ultimate weapon, the Hekatonkheires, equipped with the top-secret new Lambda Î² cockpit. The Earth Union is helpless in the face of its overwhelming power until enemy officer Isuzu makes a certain suggestion...
Source: crunchyroll
